thread.title: Sergio Gonzalez / WATCH: Duquesne students swipe a rat from their home with a vicious slapshot
thread.title_full: Sergio Gonzalez / WATCH: Duquesne students swipe a rat from their home with a vicious slapshot

title: Sergio Gonzalez / WATCH: Duquesne students swipe a rat from their home with a vicious slapshot
text:
• 1 min read 
Who says girls can’t play hockey? 
In a video posted on Twitter by Duquesne University student Jody Mackin on Friday, a group of college roommates are seen preparing to catch a rat that has taken up residence in their home. A couple of swift broom swipes send the invasive rodent down a flight of stairs before -- what else -- an inevitable killer slapshot sends the rat right out of the door. Or maybe more like, in for a goal. 
You can watch the video here: We came up with this ridiculous plan to get this rat out of our house and IT ACTUALLY WORKED!!!! BYE BITCH pic.twitter.com/c5qW76mzP8 — Jody Mackin (@jodeball4REALZ) February 17, 2017 
Nice backhand to set up the score, too. 
Somebody might want to inform the Colorado Avalanche , because we’ve got a shooter on our hands. Add a comment
